attributes.action: Hold A General Election So In The Wake Of PM David Cameron's Resignation
attributes.additional_details: Boris as PM would only make the nightmare situation that 52% of the voters have put us into. Majorly the older generations have give the young people which general polls advise around 85% wanted to stay in the EU. With out protection of EU laws we will enter dark time, lets not let that be in the hands of the tories who fed lies to the public to get them to vote leave.
attributes.background: After the EU Referendum results earlier today, and following that David Cameron's resignation as Prime Minister, this petition would be to get a General Election so the Public, the People can decide who should rule.
